Content: No good. Keeps crashing. Gnews is getting worse and worse so hoping this would be a good replacement.

One of my favorite rss readers, but... A few months ago I started getting redirects when reading my feeds, it's really annoying and only happens with this app so I'm guessing it's the developer idea in order to generate income. Honestly I would happily pay for the app as I use it on a daily basis. I'm also getting crashes every now and then. It would be nice to have an option to clear caches as right now it's taking up over 1Gb I cannot get rid of unless I clear all data. All this happens on my Oneplus 5 128Gb+8Gb so memory is not an issue.
Crashed on me 10 times in about 2 minutes, I'll go elsewhere.
Crashes every time I add a feed
It constantly crashes. If it didn't do that it would be pretty good, but on my Moto G5 it's too annoying to recommend.

Takes cues from Feedly, but actually works worse. Feedly just constantly crashes. Read freezes my entire phone for minutes at a time. On top of that, the notifications about new articles are nice, but since new articles aren't on one page, it means you have to go through all of your feeds to find an article you want to read. Needs a lot of work, but shows promise.
Constantly crashes, I finally got fed up and uninstalled this app
